name: Lanneret Compound Bow and Archery Sets - Right Hand Archery Compound Bows 0-70 lbs Draw Weight Adjustable for Adults and Beginners，Hunting Bow Kit for Beginner
short_description: 【Suitable for Beginners】：Lanneret's bow IBO Speed: 320fps;，Axle-to-Axle: 30.25"; Draw weight: 0-70lbs, Draw length: 19.25”-31”adjustable without bow press，Brace height: 7.3”, Let-off: 75%, Net weight: 2.5 lbs , Hand Orientation: Right. 100% CNC machined cams and modules can be easily adjusted to set the poundage of the compound bow ，helping you save your strength, perfect for adults and beginners.

Professional compound bow accessories can ease the vibration of your archery and assist your aiming, effectively improving the comfort level .The arm guard of the compound bow can prevent the bowstring from scratching your arm, bringing you a safe archery experience

【Only Avaliable for Right Hand】This right-handed hunting compound bow will be held in your left hand, pull the strings with your right hand and determine the arrow with your right eye to achieve perfect aim. Lanneret's archery compound bow is perfect for outdoor competition, hunting, training shooting targets, practicing sports games, and the complimentary 6 hunting arrows are easy to change to help you hunt and enjoy your time in the field.

【ProPackage】Lanneret's bow provides multiple accessories, including ：1*L1 Compound Bow，1*A -3pin sight，1*Brush Arrow Rest ，1*Rubber Stabilizer ，1*Release ，1*Wrist Sling，1*Arrow Quiver，1*Bow Stand，1*Arrow Puller，1*Compound Bow Case，1*Peep Sight，5*Allen Key，1*arm guard，1*Bowstring Wax Lubricates，10*Target Sheet ，6*Hunting Broadheads，12*Mix Carbon Arrows

name: Bear Species XT Ready to Hunt Compound Archery Bow
short_description: PROVEN BEAR PRECISION: Smooth drawing single cam system ensures consistent accuracy with every shot
ULTIMATE PERFORMANCE: Achieve speeds of up to 320 feet per second for unmatched power and accuracy
READY-TO-HUNT PACKAGE: Includes IMS V-Biscuit rest, Picatinny-mounted 4 pin sight, 5 arrow quiver, stabilizer, peep sight, and wrist sling
TAILORED FIT: Adjustable draw length range of 23.5 to 30.5 inches and draw weight options from 45-60 to 55-70 pounds provide a personalized fit for all archers
INTEGRATED TECHNOLOGY: IMS rest and picatinny sight mounting locations enable easy customization to suit your preferences
product_description: Introducing the next generation of single cam bows: the Bear Species XT. Building upon the foundation of its predecessors, this bow is the definition of performance and reliability. With its smooth drawing single cam system, the Bear Species XT offers unparalleled consistency and precision with every shot. Now featuring an Integrate Mounting System® rest and picatinny sight mounting locations, customization has never been easier. Boasting an 80% let-off, a versatile draw length range of 23.5 to 30.5 inches and draw weight options ranging from 45-60 to 55-70 pounds, the Bear Species XT provides a tailored fit for archers of all sizes and skill levels. With speeds of up to 320 feet per second and a compact 30-inch axle-to-axle length, this single cam bow delivers unmatched power, accuracy, and maneuverability, making it the ultimate choice for both seasoned veterans and newcomers alike. Plus, it comes with Trophy Ridge's ultimate Ready-To-Hunt package, featuring an IMS® V-Biscuit rest, Picatinny-mounted 4 pin sight, 5 arrow quiver, stabilizer, peep sight, and wrist sling! Experience the next evolution of single cam bows with the Bear Species XT and take your archery skills to new heights.

product_description: Discover the GENESIS Original Compound Bow and Arrow Kit, meticulously designed for users seeking a blend of versatility and performance. With 1 compound bow, 1 belt tube quiver, 1 arm guard, and 5 XX75 aluminum arrows, you've got everything you need for target practice With an adjustable draw length of 15-30"" and a draw weight of 10-20 pounds, this bow is tailored to meet the needs of archers across all skill levels and ages. Experience the ease of use with its single cam technology, eliminating tuning problems while reducing recoil, enhancing accuracy, and minimizing noise for an enjoyable archery session. This bow comes pre-assembled with a durable machined 6061-T6 aluminum riser, robust composite limbs, and high-strength bowstrings, ensuring it's ready to go right out of the box. Its lightweight design, weighing just 3.5 pounds, allows for extended use without fatigue, focusing on hitting your target with precision and confidence. Built by GENESIS, a brand known for its commitment to quality and innovation, this compound bow is a testament to superior craftsmanship, designed to provide a seamless and satisfying archery experience. Technical specifications have been carefully engineered to meet professional standards and user expectations. Each component undergoes rigorous testing to ensure consistent quality and reliability. Whether you're a beginner learning the basics or an experienced archer honing your skills, the GENESIS Original Compound Bow and Arrow Kit is engineered to support your archery journey, promoting skill development, precision, and enjoyment.

name: Sanlida Dragon 10 Flagship Top of The Line Hunting Compound Bow Kit for Adults, Standard Hunting Bow for Adults and Advanced Archers, IBO Speed 340 FPS, Limited Life-time Warranty
short_description: 【World’s NO.1 Archery Kit Brand】 Sanlida's mission is to Build a Perfect World of Archery Recreation for All Mankind.
【Sanlida Flagship Top of the Line Hunting Compound Bow】 A specialized hunting compound bow for adults and professional archers.

【F2C from Manufacturer Business Model】 Sanlida Archery is the largest archery manufacturer in China with over 25 years’ history. Our Factory to Customer directly business model can guarantee that archers will get the best bows at the lowest cost!

【Complete Full Kit Design; Matched Suitably; More Accurate】This can guarantee that the archers will get the proper level and quality of accessories easily, and the bow kit will be more matched to the archer and accurate, the archer will get the better records performance !

【Kit Accessories】 New Dragon 10 compound bow package comes with an advanced 3-pin fiber optic sight for increased visibility in low light situations; a drop away arrow rest that rises on its own as you draw the bow; a 4 inch front facing weighted aluminum stabilizer for enhanced bow balance; and a light-weight 5-arrow quiver.

【Material】 Forged CNC machined riser with 6061 T6 aluminum provides an extremely rigid riser for the demanding hunter. 100% CNC machined cams and modules with the 6061 T6 aluminum; bow string and cables are made of BCY-452X.

【Specifications】Brace Height 6.4"; Axle-to-Axle 33.5" provides great stability making this a more forgiving bow; Draw Weight 50-60lbs/ 60-70lbs; IBO Speed 340 fps; Net Weight: 5 lbs; Large Cam: Draw Length 30"-32"（Each 0.5" adjustment）; String Length 61.77"; Control Cable Length 38.74"; Y-Cable Length 35.75"; Medium Cam: Draw Length 27"-30"（Each 0.5" adjustment）; String Length 58.72"; Control Cable Length 38"; Y-Cable Length 35.79".

【Construction】Sanlida Dragon 10 hunting compound bow is designed with an unique carrying handle in front of the bow grip, this handle makes it easier to carry in long-distance hunting trips; Optimally designed brace height for maximum speed and shootability; Newly designed enhanced ball bearing cable roller eliminating cable wear commonly found in older style cable slides. Improved split limb design for reduced friction and collision, higher durability as well as reduced vibration and noise.
【No Press Needed】This Flagship hunting compound bow utilizes a hybrid cam system, which provides increased accuracy. Easily adjust the draw lengths in half inch increment without needing a bow press.

【Excellent Warranty】 Limited Life-time Warranty on main parts after your registration within 30 days of purchase. Outstanding quality at the most cost-effective price and backed with the industry leading warranty. Please read the Owner's Manual carefully before you use the bow. Dry firing compound bows may result in damages to the bow and the possible injury to the person who shooting the bow. If there is any issue with compound bow, please feel free to contact us,we will respond within 8 hours!
